name: Mobile Location GmbH
tag_list: nfc, qr-code, crm, mobile, mobile-marketing, webapp
overview:
Mobile Location offers a quick, easy and cost-effective way of helping companies to use mobile devices to acquire customers and offer services.

The company has created three product ranges which complement one another to meet the requirements of manufacturers, retailers, restaurant businesses and service providers. The core product is QRtool. This provides rapid implementation of the customer’s own mobile web pages as a WebApp and offers access opportunities via QR Code and NFC Tag. This range of services is supplemented by Passtool, which enables easy generation of mobile coupons or tickets, and by NFCtool, which produces smart posters and banners capable of direct deployment for interactive sales promotion and marketing promotion at the point-of-sale or at company premises.

Mobile Location GmbH specialises in the development and operation of SaaS solutions for B2B target groups in the field of mobile marketing and is based in Siegburg near Cologne.
